li.Name: Seek
li.desc: a quick to cast ability shot at target. target suffer a brief temporary brain damage

li.Name: Learn
li.desc: target ally or self. increase learning speed for a short while

li.Name: Hack
li.desc: target one mech. take control of that mech for a day after that it will self-shutdown

li.Name: Hacking Beacon
li.desc: place down beacon that automatically apply "System Link" to nearby enemies. used with other ability

li.Name: Laser Turret
li.desc: place down fast firing, low damage, chain-laser turret

li.Name: Knowledge Beacon
li.desc: place down beacon that boost anyone nearby ability to learn and research
